message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily routine or professional tasks. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be significantly higher than $120. Considering the quality and the potential impact it could have on your life or work, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience the product at a discounted rate compared to its market value. Would you like to proceed with this offer?
